Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-v4

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-v5

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-dense-v4

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-dense-v5

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-v5

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-v4

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-arm-v7

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-arm-v6

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-v5

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-v6

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v4

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v5

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-vector-search-optimized-arm

Vector search optimized (ARM)

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Bahrain (me-south-1), aws-me-south-1

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v4

Compute Optimized

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-vector-search-optimized-arm

Vector search optimized (ARM)

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Ireland (eu-west-1), eu-west-1

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-vector-search-optimized-arm

Vector search optimized (ARM)

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Available Instances

Instance ID Description Available Memory Sizes(MBytes)

aws.es.datahot.r6gd

Vector Search, Generative AI or semantic search applications optimized Elasticsearch instances for hot data.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

aws.es.datawarm.i3en

Storage-optimized (dense) Elasticsearch instances for warm data. Based on AWS’s i3en family.

Sao Paulo (sa-east-1), sa-east-1

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v4

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-vector-search-optimized-arm

Vector search optimized (ARM)

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

Instance ID Description Available Memory Sizes(MBytes)

N. California (us-west-1), us-west-1

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-vector-search-optimized-arm

Vector search optimized (ARM)

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm-v4

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm-v6

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm-v2

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm-v12

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) aws-hot-warm-v3

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) aws-hot-warm

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-dense-v5

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-appsearch-dedicated-v3

App Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) aws-appsearch-dedicated-v2

App Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) aws-appsearch-dedicated

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cross-cluster-search-v2

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cross-cluster-search

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cross-cluster-search-v3

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-v5

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-arm-v7

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

Enterprise Search

(DEPRECATED) aws-observability

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

Observability

(DEPRECATED) aws-security-v2

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

aws-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

aws-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-arm

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm

CPU optimized faster warm

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-cpu-optimized-faster-warm-arm

CPU optimized faster warm (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

aws-vector-search-optimized-arm

Vector search optimized (ARM)

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

aws-storage-optimized-dense

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

aws-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

aws-general-purpose-arm

General purpose (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

Compute Optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-v6

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-arm-v7

CPU optimized (ARM)

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-dense-v4

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-dense-v2

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-v4

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) aws-general-purpose-v3

(DEPRECATED) aws-cpu-optimized-v5

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) aws-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

Hot-Warm Architecture

(DEPRECATED) aws-hot-warm

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) aws-storage-optimized-dense-v5

Storage optimized (dense)

Ideal for ingestion use cases with more than 10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases with very large data sets.

(DEPRECATED) aws-appsearch-dedicated-v3

App Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) aws.enterprisesearch.c6gd.1.1

CPU-optimized instances serving as Enterprise Search nodes. Based on AWS’s c6gd family.

2048, 4096, 8192, 15360

Azureedit

New South Wales (australiaeast), azure-australiaeast

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

Hot-Warm Architecture

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

Hot-Warm Architecture

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated-v2

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search-v2

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

Enterprise Search

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability-v2

Observability

General purpose Elasticsearch instances for hot data. Based on Azure’s ddv4 family.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

Iowa (centralus), azure-centralus

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Memory Optimized

(DEPRECATED) azure-storage-optimized-v2

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated-v2

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

Cross Cluster Search

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search-v2

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

Observability

Observability

Virginia (eastus), azure-eastus

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720

(DEPRECATED) appsearch

The instance configuration to be used for AppSearch nodes running as both app server and worker

2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) azure.appsearch.d64sv3

A CPU optimized App Search instance.

2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) azure.enterprisesearch.d64sv3

A CPU optimized Elastic Enterprise Search instance.

2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) enterprise.search

The instance configuration to be used for Elastic Enterprise Search nodes

2048, 4096, 8192
Virginia (eastus2), azure-eastus2

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-storage-optimized-v2

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated-v2

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search-v2

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated-v2

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability-v2

Observability

(DEPRECATED) azure-security-v2

Security

(DEPRECATED) azure-security

Security

Prevent, detect, and respond to threats with SIEM, endpoint security, and threat hunting.

(DEPRECATED) azure-io-optimized-v2

I/O Optimized

Ideal for time-series data, such as logs and metrics.

(DEPRECATED) azure-io-optimized

I/O Optimized

Use for for all-purpose workloads, including time-series data like logs and metrics.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

App Search

Easily implement powerful search experiences for your website, app, or workplace with refined APIs and tools.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search-v2

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated-v2

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability-v3

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability-v2

Security

Ireland (northeurope), azure-northeurope

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-storage-optimized-v2

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated-v2

App Search

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

(DEPRECATED) master

Instance configuration to be used for dedicated masters

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 16384, 32768, 65536

(DEPRECATED) data.frozen

An instance configuration to be used for high storage Elasticsearch frozen data tier nodes

4096, 8192, 16384, 32768, 65536

(DEPRECATED) coordinating

Instance configuration to be used for dedicated request coordination instances

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) kibana

Instance configuration to be used for Kibana

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) azure.apm.fsv2.2

CPU-optimized instances serving as APM nodes. Based on Azure’s fsv2 family.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720

(DEPRECATED) apm

Instance configuration to be used for APM

512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) integrations.server

Instance configuration to be used for Integrations Server

512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192

(DEPRECATED) azure.integrationsserver.fsv2.2

CPU-optimized instances serving as Integrations Server nodes. Based on Azure’s fsv2 family.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720

(DEPRECATED) enterprise.search

The instance configuration to be used for Elastic Enterprise Search nodes

2048, 4096, 8192
Texas (southcentralus), azure-southcentralus

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-storage-optimized-v2

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cross-cluster-search-v2

Cross Cluster Search

Search data across one or more associated remote deployments.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) azure-enterprise-search-dedicated-v2

Enterprise Search

Add a search experience to your website, applications, or search the apps you use at work.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability-v3

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

(DEPRECATED) azure-observability-v2

Observability

Use logs, metrics, and APM data to monitor and react to to events in your environment.

(DEPRECATED) azure-security-v3

Security

Prevent, detect, and respond to threats with SIEM, endpoint security, and threat hunting.

(DEPRECATED) azure-security-v2

Security

Prevent, detect, and respond to threats with SIEM, endpoint security, and threat hunting.

(DEPRECATED) azure-io-optimized-v4

I/O Optimized

Ideal for time-series data, such as logs and metrics.

(DEPRECATED) azure-io-optimized-v2

I/O Optimized

Ideal for time-series data, such as logs and metrics.

(DEPRECATED) azure-io-optimized

I/O Optimized

Use for for all-purpose workloads, including time-series data like logs and metrics.

(DEPRECATED) azure-io-optimized-v3

I/O Optimized

Ideal for time-series data, such as logs and metrics.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-storage-optimized-v2

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm-v3

Hot-Warm Architecture

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm

Useful for time-series analytics that benefit from automatic index curation.

(DEPRECATED) azure-appsearch-dedicated-v2

2048, 4096, 8192
Netherlands (westeurope), azure-westeurope

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v3

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-compute-optimized-v2

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-general-purpose-v2

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v3

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

(DEPRECATED) azure-memory-optimized-v2

Memory Optimized

Best for small data sets and low query loads.

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

(DEPRECATED) azure-cpu-optimized-v2

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

(DEPRECATED) azure-hot-warm-v2

Hot-Warm Architecture

Available templates

Template ID Name Description

azure-storage-optimized

Storage optimized

Good for most ingestion use cases with 7-10 days of data available for fast access. Also good for light search use cases without heavy indexing or CPU needs.

azure-cpu-optimized

CPU optimized

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 1-4 days of data available for fast access and for search use cases with indexing and querying workloads. Provides the most CPU resources per unit of RAM.

azure-vector-search-optimized

Vector Search optimized

Optimized for applications that leverage Vector Search and/or Generative AI. Also the optimal choice for utilizing ELSER for semantic search applications. Broadly suitable for all semantic search, text embedding, image search, and other Vector Search use cases.

azure-general-purpose

General purpose

Suitable for ingestion use cases with 5-7 days of data available for fast access. Also good for search workloads with less-frequent indexing and medium to high querying loads. Provides a balance of storage, memory, and CPU.

Compute Optimized

Designed for search-heavy workloads.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

Storage-optimized (dense HDD) Elasticsearch instances for cold data. Based on Azure’s edsv4 family.

2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

azure.es.datahot.edsv4

Storage-optimized Elasticsearch instances for hot data. Based on Azure’s edsv4 family.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

Vector Search, Generative AI or semantic search applications optimized Elasticsearch instances for hot data.

1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 15360, 30720, 61440

Storage-optimized (dense HDD) Elasticsearch instances for warm data. Based on Azure’s edsv4 family.
